Article_Body: An interior shot of the new K11 Musea mall. A large geometric sphere looms over one of the mall's atriums. Art and cultural programs are ran in the retail complex throughout the year. The mall was opened in late August by Adrian Cheng.  "A lot of people think brick-and-mortar retail is on the decline," said K11's Cheng. "This is only true if you're following the conventional retail formula that limits retail to mere products." The mall is one of three dozen K11 properties set to open around China by 2024. A sculpture by Swiss artist Urs Fischer on view at the K11 Musea.
